quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: If you want to be successful, prepare to be doubted and tested.
author: Anonymous

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
author: Anonymous

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
author: Michele Ruiz

quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Behind every successful person are a lot of unsuccessful years.
author: Bob Brown

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Do what you love and success will follow. Passion is the fuel behind a successful career.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process.
author: Jack Ma

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: One secret of success is to refuse to let temporary setbacks defeat you.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Success is best when it’s shared.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: Forget about style; worry about results.
author: Bobby Orr

quote: It's not about money or connections—it's the willingness to outwork and outlearn everyone.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success is dependent on effort.
author: Sophocles

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: Success isn't just about what you accomplish, it's about what you inspire others to do.
author: Anonymous
